text.v: Hóa đơn dịch vụ trả lại

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int, @roundFAmount int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$', @detail = 'd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$', @general = 'c&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chứng từ số %s1 ngày %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã tồn tại.' else 'The voucher number %s1 dated %s2 at row %s3 already exists.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @roundFAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_nt' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C002' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end if @r is not null and @$mode <> 1 begin if @check$Unit <> '1' select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r else select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end -- Update update @@table set so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)), ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk = case when a.tk <> '' then a.tk else c.tk end, tk_thue = case when a.tk_thue <> '' then a.tk_thue else d.tk_thue_no end from @@table a left join dmkh c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; @@checking(1); &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking;&EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, tien_nt2, tien2, ma_thue, thue_suat, tk_thue, thue_nt, thue, tk_no, ma_kh2, dien_giai, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldDetail; into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.tien_nt2, round(a.tien_nt2 * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.ma_thue, d.thue_suat, a.tk_thue, round(a.tien_nt2 * (d.thue_suat / 100), case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.tien_nt2 * a.ty_gia * (d.thue_suat / 100), @roundAmount), a.tk_no, a.ma_kh2, a.dien_giai2, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldDetailInsert; from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt &VoucherGoodsTypeImportDetailUpdate; select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, so_ct0, ngay_ct0, ma_mau_ct, so_seri, dien_giai, loai_ct, tk, ma_kh, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_tien_nt2, t_tien2, t_tt_nt, t_tt, t_thue_nt, t_thue, invat_yn, mau_bc, ma_tc&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldMaster; into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, a.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.so_ct0, a.ngay_ct0, a.ma_mau_ct, a.so_seri, a.dien_giai, '', a.tk, a.ma_kh, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, d.t_tien_nt2, d.t_tien2, d.t_tt_nt, d.t_tt, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue, a.invat_yn, a.mau_bc, a.ma_tc&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldMasterInsert; from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt &VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterJoin;join (select stt_rec, sum(tien_nt2) as t_tien_nt2, sum(tien2) as t_tien2, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue, sum(tien_nt2 + thue_nt) as t_tt_nt, sum(tien2 + thue) as t_tt from #d&Detail;&VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterWhere; group by stt_rec) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec &VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterUpdate; select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#20$' + rtrim(tk) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'tk_no, ma_thue', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q declare @p varchar(32), @masterFields varchar(8000), @detailFields varchar(8000), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting; insert into ctgt21 (stt_rec, ngay_ct, ngay_lct, ten_kh, dia_chi, ma_so_thue) select a.stt_rec, a.ngay_ct, a.ngay_ct, b.ten_kh, b.dia_chi, b.ma_so_thue from #m&Detail; a join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh declare @External nvarchar(4000), @Statement nvarchar(4000), @Numeric varchar(4000), @String varchar(4000), @fieldSelect varchar(4000) if @status <> 0 begin &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPost; select * into #detailpost from #d&Detail; where line_nbr = 1 select *, so_seri as so_seri0 into #m20 from #m&Detail; where invat_yn = 0 select @External = 'ten_vt = c.dien_giai, tk_du = c.tk, tk_thue_co = b.tk_thue, t_thue_nt = -b.thue_nt, t_thue = -b.thue, t_tien_nt2 = -b.tien_nt2, t_tien2 = -b.tien2, status = ''' + @status + ''',ma_ct = ''' + @voucherID + ''', loai_ct = '''', ngay_lct = isnull(c.ngay_ct0, b.ngay_ct), so_ct = case when c.so_ct0 = '''' then b.so_ct else c.so_ct0 end, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = '', @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_kho,ghi_chu, ma_nvbh,so_dh, ma_nk, ma_mau_ct, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPostTaxOut; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostTax '#m20', '#d&Detail;', '#k', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '1' select *, so_seri as so_seri0 into #m30 from #m&Detail; where invat_yn = 1 select @External = 'ngay_lct = isnull(c.ngay_ct0, b.ngay_ct), ngay_ct0 = isnull(c.ngay_ct0, b.ngay_ct), ten_vt = c.dien_giai, tk_du = c.tk, tk_thue_no = b.tk_thue, t_thue_nt = b.thue_nt, t_thue = b.thue, t_tien_nt = b.tien_nt2, t_tien = b.tien2, status = ''' + @status + ''',ma_ct = ''' + @voucherID + ''', loai_ct = '''', so_ct = case when c.so_ct0 = '''' then b.so_ct else c.so_ct0 end, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = '', @Numeric = 'gia_nt, gia, so_luong, nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_tt, ma_kho, ghi_chu, so_dh, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPostTaxIn; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostTax '#m30', '#d&Detail;', '#k', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '2' select *, @voucherID as ma_ct, @datetime0 as datetime0, @datetime0 as datetime2, @user as user_id0, @user as user_id2 into #malloc from #m&Detail; select *, tien_nt2 as tt_nt, tien2 as tt into #dalloc from #d&Detail; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$Allocation @voucherID, '', '#malloc', '#dalloc', 't_tt_nt', 't_tt', 'tt_nt', 'tt', 'cttt50', '', '' end if @status = '1' begin select @fieldSelect = 'stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ''' + @voucherID + ''' , ngay_ct, so_ct, t_tt_nt , t_tt, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai,''' + @datetime0 + ''',' + rtrim(@user) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostLater '#m&Detail;', @voucherID, @fieldSelect, '' end if @status = '2' begin declare @glGroup varchar(128), @glAcctField varchar(128), @glAcctFieldRef varchar(128), @glAmountField varchar(128), @glFCAmountField varchar(128), @glKey varchar(512), @glNoAccList VARCHAR(128), @glNoAccListRef VARCHAR(128), @cNoAccounts varchar(128), @glGroups varchar(128) select @cNoAccounts = replace(rtrim(val), '''', '''''') from options where name = 'm_tk_tk_vt' if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_post_hh_hddt' and val = '1') begin select @glAcctField = 'tk_no,tk,tk_thue', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk,tk_no,tk', @glAmountField = 'tien2,tien2,thue', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt2,tien_nt2,thue_nt', @glKey = 'loai<>''90'',loai=''90'',thue_suat <> 0', @glNoAccList = '0,0', @glNoAccListRef = '0,0', @glGroups = '1,1,0' exec sp_executesql N'update #d&Detail; set tien_nt2 = -tien_nt2, tien2 = -tien2 where loai = ''90''' end else begin select @glAcctField = 'tk_no,tk_thue', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk,tk', @glAmountField = 'tien2,thue', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt2,thue_nt', @glKey = '1=1,thue_suat <> 0', @glNoAccList = '0', @glNoAccListRef = '0', @glGroups = '1,0' end select @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_nk, so_lo, ong_ba, ma_gd, so_dh, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3', @External = 'so_ctgs = '''', head_item = '''', so_ct0 = b.so_ct0, ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0, ct_nxt = 0, gt_no = 0, gt_co = 0, gt_dd = 0, dien_giai_h = b.dien_giai, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = 'update #gl set dien_giai = b.dien_giai from #gl a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec join #dGL c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec and (a.tk = c.tk_thue or a.tk_du = c.tk_thue)' select @glGroup = groupby from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @voucherID select stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, dien_giai, tien_nt2, tien2, tk_no, thue_nt, thue, tk_thue, thue_suat, cast('' as varchar(32)) as ma_kh2, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldDetail; into #dGL0 from #d&Detail; update #d&Detail; set ma_kh2 = '' where tk_thue in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 0) select a.*, b.tk, b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_kh, case when a.ma_kh2 <> '' then a.ma_kh2 else b.ma_kh end as ma_kh_ref, @voucherID as ma_ct, cast('' as char(2)) as loai_ct, b.ngay_ct as ngay_lct, b.ma_nt, b.ty_gia, b.dien_giai as dien_giai_h into #dGL from #dGL0 a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where (not (@cNoAccounts <> '' and dbo.ff_inlist(b.tk, @cNoAccounts) = 1)) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostGL '#m&Detail;', '#dGL', @voucherID, @glAcctField, @glAcctFieldRef, @glAmountField, @glFCAmountField, @glKey, @glNoAccList, @glNoAccListRef, @glGroup, @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '#k', @glGroups end
